Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
items.Weapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Fists, Gauntlet, Pistol, Sword
public abstract class Weapon extends Object implements Item
Represents a weapon item in the U-Energy RPG game.

A weapon is an equipable item that deals damage and may have specific requirements such as minimum level and damage type. It is associated with a Character user and implements the Item interface for serialization and display.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      public Weapon(String name, int[] damageDice, int damageBonus, int minLevel, combat.DamageType damageType, characters.Character user)
      Constructs a weapon with the specified attributes.

      Damage is calculated using a dice roll and bonus.

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the weapon
      damageDice - an array with two elements: [number of dice, sides per die]
      damageBonus - a flat bonus added to the rolled damage
      minLevel - the minimum level required to equip the weapon
      damageType - the type of damage the weapon deals
      user - the character who will use the weapon
